metadata.description: Production-ready Claude Code plugins: Godot 4.6 game dev toolkit, MCP App UI builder, Open Responses LLM orchestration, creative WebGPU frontends, and AI-First CLI scaffolding

plugins.name: godot-claude
plugins.description: Comprehensive Godot 4.6 development toolkit for studios. 15 skills covering GDScript, C#, shaders, GDExtension, navigation, animation, audio, patterns, multiplayer, optimization, and more.

plugins.name: mcp-app-next-ui
plugins.description: Build MCP Apps with Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui.

plugins.name: open-responses
plugins.description: Open Responses specification implementation for multi-provider LLM orchestration.

plugins.name: creative-frontend
plugins.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with WebGPU 3D graphics.

plugins.name: tool-creator
plugins.description: Create AI-First CLI tools with uv, Typer, Pydantic, and Loguru.
